title: Cover Story: Dynamic Duo: 75 Indira and Lt. Gen.Satish Nambiar (retd) Breaking Barriers

quotes: First Force Commander and Head of Mission of the UN Peacekeeping Forces in the former Yugoslavia: 3rd March 1992 to 2nd March 1993.
As Military Adviser, High Commission of India: 1984.
Even back in the fifties when I completed my school and college, the brighter chaps always opted for the corporate world as there was more money.
